attributes.action: Create legislation to protect the privacy of students in schools and colleges across the country by banning CCTV in the toilets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: CCTV in school toilets is an outrageous breach of privacy to anybody but even worse this is issue is including minors and is completely inappropriate. I understand the need for CCTV around schools for the protection of students and i have no issue with having CCTV to observe who enters the toilets incase of an act of vandalism, i however do protest to cameras being in the toilets observing everything from the urinals to the sinks.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
